text: Ballston Spa is a village and the county seat of Saratoga County, New York, United States, located southwest of Saratoga Springs. The population of the village, named after Rev. Eliphalet Ball, a Congregationalist clergyman and an early settler, was 5,111 at the 2020 census. ==References== Category:Villages in New York (state) Category:County seats in New York (state)
title: Ballston Spa, New York
